node.display_long_description:
THE AWARD WINNING MULTI-TASKING SHOOTER

“A fun shooter with a twist” 8/10 THE SIXTH AXIS
“an experience that should be in the top tier of VR games” 9/10 GAMING NEXUS
"Silly, funny, demanding and absolutely unique" PSVR WITHOUT PAROLE
“as much fun for the VR fanatic as it is for the casual player” 8/10 GAMING TREND
"Definitely a hidden gem" NATHIE

Do your job whilst shooting guns! Shooty Fruity combines job simulation with exhilarating combat that makes you feel like a true action hero - whether McClane, Wick or Rambo. Take on new roles and unlock weapons to fight your way through your career. Scan shoot repeat!

SHOOTER MEETS JOB SIM
Frantic multi-tasking gameplay only possible in VR
EXHILARATING COMBAT
Shoot hordes of enemies with an expanding array of guns
HIGH OCTANE ARSENAL
Including flak cannons, gatling guns & missile launchers
POWER UP
Wield bullet-time slow-mo, exploding ammo & more
YOUR NEW CAREER
Scan, serve & pack across countless missions to rise the leaderboards

node.reviewDescription:
Job simulator + Fruit ninja + Guns!

I'm gonna get the cons out of the way first:
Just gonna say right now that one of the only flaws is the graphics. I get that your trying to incorporate the cartoonish look but the graphics could use some work. The fruit doesn't look 3d enough. Their could be more design in things. Hopefully you come out with a big graphics update or something. Also I don't know if I'm doing something wrong but in the staff room I feel like I'm floating a foot or 2 above the ground. I reset the floor hight in the oculus main menu but it doesn't seem to do anything.

Now that that stuff is out of the way:
The concept of the store being under attack by killer fruit that you have to shoot while having to multitask and ring up groceries to get better guns, is very different from anything on the quest, in a good way. It's all even better with the hilarious commentary of your manage criticizing everything you do! Some of the stuff that they say gets a little repetitive but not too much.

Here are my rating for different parts:
Graphics 8/10
Audio 9/10
Gameplay 10/10
Instructions 10/10
Controls 9/10
Haptic feedback 10/10
Fruit shooting/multitasking concept 10/10
Comedy 11/10!

Here are some ideas I have for adding to the game:
-a locomotion option for moving around the staff room
-weekly challenges
-more detail in the graphics
-mini games
-multiplay mode where 2 people take a shift together defending the store.
-maybe the fruit could have voices. Maybe a watermelon could say "hello" in a deep voice when it gets close. Or apple could say things like "want a peice of me" or it could scream when it jumps at you. I think it could be kinda funny. And I think that comedy would fit with your manager criticizing you.

Hopefully a developer can reply to my review and let me know their thoughts on some of my ideas. This is a great game and I really want to see some amazing updates in the future! Hopefully the graphics get a little better too!

Thanks for an amazing vr experience!

Do your job whilst shooting guns! Shooty Fruity combines high agency job simulation with exhilarating combat that makes you feel like a true action hero - whether McClane, Wick or Rambo. 

Scan, serve & pack across countless missions. Take on new roles and unlock weapons to fight your way through your career. Scan shoot repeat!
